Background.text:
Treatment of sex partners of patients diagnosed with
chlamydia
or
gonorrhea
by providing treatment or medications to the patient to take to his/her partner without the health care provider examining the partner.
Decreases recurrence
Legal in most states. Potentially permissible in some. Prohibited in a few (FL, KY, OH, WV)

Management.text:
Male partner: give allergy instructions
Female partner: needs pregnancy test first
MSM: need
HIV
test (â†‘HIV rate)
